commit.message: RDM-8072 - Use parseUnresolved for converting dates to ISO8601
Add ISO format to error messages detailing expected formats
Refactor DateTimeFormatParser to allow list of permitted input formats

nodes.bodyText: baseType == BaseType.get(DATETIME) is used in multiple places in this method.. so please create a variable

nodes.bodyText: parsed != null is not needed here, instead use parsePosition.getErrorIndex() == -1 in isValidParseResult method.
This will add null as well into the exception message as permittedInputFormats may contain null values

Don't expose these methods convertDateTimeToIso8601, convertDateToIso8601, instead create a common convert method which accepts baseType (FieldType.DATE, FieldType.DATETIME) and then do the logic based on that.
and Move FieldType.DATE, FieldType.DATETIME to common class
Please add check for null value parameter as well and add test cases accordingly
